2110479 Computer Graphics

Documentation website for the Computer Graphics course at Chulalongkorn University.

Start with Labs

Computer Graphics

Learn the basics of rendering, shading, lighting, and transformations for creating visual scenes.

OpenGL

Practice 2D and 3D graphics programming with OpenGL and shaders.

Ray Tracing

Explore ray tracing for realistic lighting, reflections, and shadows.
